mapper.select: select train_id, s.station_name start_station, t.station_name arrive_station, start_time, arrive_time, mile from T_route, T_station s, T_station t where (T_route.station_id=s.station_id) AND (T_route.arrive_station = t.station_id) AND (s.station_name=#{start_station}) AND (t.station_name=#{end_station})
